title: Create and Deploy Your First Smart Contract
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Use Remix to create a Counter contract and deploy it to **any Ethereum testnet**: 
Counter contract should have
1. A state variable counter
2. `get()` method: to retrieve the value of counter
3. `add(x)` method: to increment the variable by x.

Please submit the URL of the blockchain explorer for the transaction hash of the call to `add(x)` in the answer box.

description:
This challenge is designed to understand accounts and Gas, as well as the entire process of writing, compiling, and deploying contracts.
At the same time, master the simple use of Remix, wallets, and blockchain explorers.
